cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 3078, Pipeline and LNG Facility Cybersecurity Preparedness Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 81 (Tuesday, May 11, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. UPTON:
H.R. 3078.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3: Congress shall have power
to regulate Commerce with foreign Nations, and among the
several States, and with the Indian Tribes.
[Page H2195]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

title: Pipeline and LNG Facility Cybersecurity Preparedness Act
